languages.text: {n}Сенешаль кивает вам, как бы говоря "Продолжайте", затем переводит пронзительный взгляд на толпу перед вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль одобрительно кивает вам, как бы говоря "Продолжайте", затем переводит пронзительный взгляд на толпу перед вами.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль кивает вам, как бы говоря "Продолжайте", затем переводит пронзительный взгляд на толпу перед вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you, as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd in front of you.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you, as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd in front of you.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you, as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd you are facing.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you, as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd you are facing.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長が続きを促すようにうなずき、あなたと対面する群衆たちに突き刺すような視線を移す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長が続きを促すようにうなずき、あなたと対面する群衆たちに突き刺すような視線を移す。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德朝你点点头，似乎在鼓励你说下去。随后他转过身，以锐利的目光扫视着你面前乌压压的人群。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德朝你点点头，似乎在鼓励你说下去。随后他转过身，以锐利的目光扫视着你面前乌压压的人群。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal vous adresse un signe de tête, comme pour vous presser de continuer, tout en promenant son regard perçant sur la foule devant vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal vous adresse un signe de tête, comme pour vous presser de continuer, tout en promenant son regard perçant sur la foule devant vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Senescal te hace un gesto con la cabeza, como instándote a continuar, y luego desplaza su mirada penetrante hacia la multitud frente a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Senescal te hace un gesto con la cabeza, como instándote a continuar, y luego desplaza su mirada penetrante hacia la multitud a la que te enfrentas.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess nickt dir zu, als würde er dich auffordern, fortzufahren, und richtet seinen durchbohrenden Blick dann auf die Menge vor dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess nickt dir zu, als würde er dich auffordern, fortzufahren, und richtet seinen durchbohrenden Blick dann auf die Menge vor dir.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal, devam etmeni beklercesine başıyla onaylıyor. Ardından bakışlarını önündeki kalabalığa çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal nods to you as if urging you to continue, then shifts his piercing gaze to the crowd before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal, devam etmeni bekler gibi başıyla onaylıyor. Ardından bakışlarını önündeki kalabalığa çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
